title: Union Bank of India becomes first major Indian Bank to sign PCAF
description: Union Bank of India has joined the Partnership for Carbon Accounting Financials (PCAF) to align with global climate risk management efforts. This move follows the Reserve Bank of India's draft guidelines on climate risk disclosures, emphasizing the importance of tracking financed emissions. The bank aims to measure and manage its indirect emissions from lending and investment activities.
